assignments.description: Assignment of AccountId of collected Account record in order to populate the Account Id of the New AccountContactRelationship record
assignments.name: Assign_Account_Record_ID_to_varR_AccountContactRelationship
assignments.label: Assign Account Record ID to varR_AccountContactRelationship

assignments.description: Assignment of PersonContactId of collected Account record in order to populate the Contact Id of the New AccountContactRelationship record because this is the person account in the relation where the business account should be connected as 'AccountId'
assignments.name: Assign_Account_Record_ID_to_varR_AccountContactRelationship_As_Contact
assignments.label: Assign Account Record ID to varR_AccountContactRelationship As Contact

assignments.description: Assign necessary values for record variable
assignments.name: Assign_Values_To_New_Account_Contact_Relationship_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Values To New Account Contact Relationship Variable

assignments.description: Assign necessary values for record variable
assignments.name: Assign_Values_To_New_MDW_Account_Contact_Relationship_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Values To New MDW Account Contact Relationship Variable

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_Account' if the Element fails.
assignments.name: Assign_VarT_FlowElementGet_Account
assignments.label: VarT_FlowElement - Get_Account

assignments.description: Error Message to show on the current/existing accountcontactrelationships with possibly same combination between accounts
assignments.name: Assignment_Of_Error_Message_In_Case_Of_Duplicate
assignments.label: Assignment Of Error Message In Case Of Duplicate

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_AccountContactRelationshipAccount' if the Element fails.
assignments.name: VarT_FlowElement_Get_AccountContactRelationshipAccount
assignments.label: VarT_FlowElement - Get_AccountContactRelationshipAccount

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_AccountContactRelationshipContactMDW' if the Element fails.
assignments.name: VarT_FlowElement_Get_AccountContactRelationshipContactMDW
assignments.label: VarT_FlowElement - Get_AccountContactRelationshipContactMDW

assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Get_AccountCreatedSelectedPerson' if the Element fails.
assignments.name: VarT_FlowElement_Get_AccountCreatedSelectedPerson
assignments.label: VarT_FlowElement - Get_AccountCreatedSelectedPerson

decisions.description: To decide if PersonAccount needs to be registered as ContactId in AccountContactRelationship with Business Account as AccountId
decisions.name: Account_Record_PersonAccount_RelationType_MDW
decisions.label: Account Record = PersonAccount & RelationType = MDW

decisions.description: In case a new person account needs to be created for this relationship
decisions.name: Create_New_PersonAccount
decisions.label: Create New PersonAccount

decisions.description: To determine if the current social network relationships should be showed in a screen
decisions.name: Existing_Social_Network_For_MDW_Records_To_Show
decisions.label: Existing Social Network For MDW Records To Show

rules.name: Yes_show_existing_relationships_as_MDW
rules.label: Yes, show existing relationships as MDW

decisions.description: To determine if the current social network relationships should be showed in a screen
decisions.name: Existing_Social_Network_Records_To_Show
decisions.label: Existing Social Network Records To Show

recordCreates.description: Create the new record based on the filled variable
recordCreates.name: Create_AccountContactRelationship
recordCreates.label: Account Contact Relationship

recordLookups.description: Get Account record based on the entered recordId
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Account

recordLookups.description: Collection of current social network of this account with all MDW and CPE
recordLookups.name: Get_AccountContactRelationshipAccount
recordLookups.label: Account Contact Relationship - Account

recordLookups.description: Collection of current social network of this account with all MDW only because this path is only there for the new relation between this person account with a business account to search in next flow elements.
recordLookups.name: Get_AccountContactRelationshipContactMDW
recordLookups.label: Account Contact Relationship - Contact MDW

recordLookups.description: Get the selected person account record of the subflow or the selected person account in the screen after database search
recordLookups.name: Get_AccountCreatedSelectedPerson
recordLookups.label: Account - Created / Selected Person

recordRollbacks.description: If the Flow Errors we don't want to stop half way in the process. The whole process should roll back and run again.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecords
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Records

screens.description: Screen to relate account and person account (contact) to this relationship
screens.name: Business_Account_with_PersonAccount_relation
screens.label: Business Account with PersonAccount relation

screens.description: Screen to visualize the social network of this account
screens.name: Screen_Current_Social_Network
screens.label: Screen Current Social Network

fields.name: Txt_DisplayCheckDuplicates
fields.fieldText: It seems that the combination between the persons has already been made with the same start date. Creating a new relationship is therefore not possible. Check the list below.

screens.description: Screen to visualize the existing and previous employers of this account
screens.name: Screen_PersonAccount_Current_MDW_of_BA
screens.label: Screen PersonAccount Current MDW of BA

fields.name: Txt_DisplayCheckMDWDuplicates
fields.fieldText: It seems that the combination between the company and the person has already been made. Creating a new relationship is therefore not possible. Check the list below.

screens.description: Screen to search for and select a person account to relate with the known person account
screens.name: Screen_Search_New_Social_Network_Contact
screens.label: Screen Search New Social Network Contact

fields.name: Txt_FoundResults
fields.fieldText: Success, there are {!AL_Keyword_Search_in_Database.Results.varN_ContactCount} search results. Please select an account from the list or click 'Next' to create a new account.

subflows.description: Show the generic Screen Flow Error Screen.
subflows.name: Subflow_ErrorScreen
subflows.label: Error Screen

subflows.description: Publish the Flow Fault Platform Event.
subflows.name: Subflow_PublishFlowFaultEvent
subflows.label: Publish Flow Fault Event

subflows.description: Subflow in order to create a new account record to use for this relationship
subflows.name: Subflow_To_Create_New_Account_Record
subflows.label: Subflow To Create New Account Record

variables.description: This variable is used to store the Flow Element name if a flow errors.
variables.name: VarT_FlowElement
